organization-invitations.title: Manage invitation
organization-invitations.no-selected-organization-disclamer: You need to select an organization to use this panel.

organization-invitation.title: You have been invited to the "{{ name }}" organization

information.INVITED: Please accept or decline this invitation.

seeOrganization.name: See organization
seeOrganization.description: Allow organization's member to see global organization data. Except members or policies for which specific rules exist.

seeMembers.name: See organization's members
seeMembers.description: Allow organization's member to see the list of members of this organization. Personnal data are still kept safe. Only avatar, name, and roles are visible.

manageMembers.name: Manage organization's members
manageMembers.description: Allow organization's member to invite other user to this organization, to change other member's role, and remove a member from the organization.

seePolicies.name: See organization's policies
seePolicies.description: Allow members to see the existing roles and the rights they have upon the existing policies.

managePolicies.name: Manage organization's policies
managePolicies.description: Allow members to create or delete organization's role. They will also have the possibility to change the rights attach to each existing role.
